column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The bread they bring you is amazing--very hearty and slightly sour with a perfect crust. We had the braised beef short ribs with mashed potatoes
column2: the goat cheese baked in tomato sauce
column3: and chorizo wrapped dates. For dessert we ordered the pistachio cake with oranges and the sampler they had at the bottom of the menu. Everything was delicious
column4: especially the desserts...perfect little bites of carefully arranged flavors.
